text:
As the guest host of Jimmy Kimmel Live, Kristen Bell got to call the shots and decided to make everyone’s dreams come true. The whole show was full of incredible surprises for both the guests and audience. In the most touching moment, Bell helped a LA teenager ask his crush to prom. She had no clue.

“This could go terrible wrong,” Bell said right before the big ask. But it didn’t

The whole segment was “Frozen” themed, with costumes, a game, and Bell serenading the couple. It’s the stuff dreams are made of. The only problem is that prom itself will seem like a bit of a let down in comparison to the promposal. A DJ shouting along to “Baby Got Back” isn’t quite as nice as a Kristen Bell serenade.
title: Kristen Bell’s “Frozen” Promposal Made Dreams Come True
